body: Why is this short.... I have read this before but have a different ending where the girl searching for the Boy, she went back on their usual hiding place and reminiscing their time together, and the boy showed up as well. The girl Cried that she didn't see the Boy at the entrance ceremony in her surprised she was a year Older at school, They both exchange names afterwards (･ัω･ั)

I had to Search for Keywords and Similar Image because i thought there's going to be more series on this one T_T Sadly there's none 

Took me time for keywords like Condo, Secret Base, Hentai Manga till i hit the first page, was happy to read it again :') Sweet memories
